# TASK::PLAY_ANIM_ON_RUNNING_SCENARIO

## Summary
Triggers the passed in clip to play as an animation for the current ped used scenario

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **STRING** clipSet:
Is a clipset not a clip dictionary! This means the string must refer to something in clip_sets.pso.meta.
 If you do not know how to specify a clipset in data, ask Default AI.
* **STRING** clip

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Full list of animation dictionaries and anims by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/animDictsCompact.json
